about.aboutText1: FinMind is a comprehensive financial management application designed to help you track expenses, manage budgets, and achieve your financial goals.
about.aboutText2: Our mission is to make personal finance management simple, intuitive, and accessible to everyone.
about.privacyPolicyDescription: Read our privacy policy to understand how we protect your data
about.softwareLicensesDescription: View third-party software licenses used in this app
about.termsOfServiceDescription: Read our terms of service and user agreement
about.title: About FinMind

export.message: Select the format for exporting data:
export.title: Export Data

info.description: Automatic backup runs every night at 2:00 AM. Your data is protected with advanced encryption.

manualBackup.message: Do you want to backup your data?
manualBackup.title: Manual Backup

restore.message: Do you want to restore data from the latest backup? This will replace current data.
restore.title: Restore Data

help.contactDescription: If you need more help, please contact us through the following methods

addExpense.answer: Click the plus button on the main page, select expense type, enter amount and description, then save.
addExpense.question: How to add a new expense?

backup.answer: Enable cloud sync feature in settings page to automatically backup your data.
backup.question: How to backup my data?

changePassword.answer: Go to Settings > Security > Change Password, enter your current password and new password, then confirm the change.
changePassword.question: How to change my password?

createCategory.answer: In the expense entry screen, tap on category field, then tap "Add New Category" to create a custom category.
createCategory.question: How to create a new expense category?

monthlyReport.answer: Monthly reports are automatically generated and can be viewed in the Statistics tab. You can also export them as PDF.
monthlyReport.question: How to view monthly reports?

notifications.answer: You can manage notification preferences in settings.
notifications.question: How do I manage notifications?

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
